text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a INVSBJ

name: RoleClassInvestigationSubject
title: RoleClassInvestigationSubject
description: An entity that is the subject of an investigation. This role is scoped by the party responsible for the investigation.
